channel.title: Hello Fellows RSPS Makers!
channel.description: Hiya, i just made a web client from rs-ps, and when i load it and run says error connecting re trying in so and so secs. I don't know why, and i don't know is this is the write thread for this, but i will greatly appreciate your help thank you.

item.title: Hello Fellows RSPS Makers!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

I love U I:

it is “error” connecting retrying in a 5 sec. so, what is CRC?

Basically just a checksum for the cache files. It tries to talk to the server and get the current cache version. However, most servers don’t support this. So to stop that, there’s a method in client.java of the Client that people comment out to prevent the CRC check. I can’t tell you which method in particular, because I don’t know the revision, if it’s been renamed, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Hello Fellows RSPS Makers!

item.title: Hello Fellows RSPS Makers!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

I love U I:

im trying to make a webclient for my server. from rs-ps which hosts my server within minutes. but when i press run, it say’s error connecting.

if it starts with “Error”, then it can’t find the cache.
If it starts with “error”, then you didn’t disable the CRC checking in the client.java

Read full topic
